snippet: A senior government official said that a wealthy family close to President Jacob Zuma had offered him a cabinet position, a revelation that added to corruption allegations against the president.
abstract: South African finance official Mcebisi Jonas says he was offered cabinet post in Pres Jacob G Zuma's administration by members of Gupta family, which denies claim amid scrutiny of their political influence.
lead_paragraph: A senior government official said that a wealthy family close to President Jacob Zuma had offered him a cabinet position, a revelation that added to corruption allegations against the president.

headline.main: South Africa: A Rich Family’s Clout
